about_the_game:
Your application for the unpaid underappreciated undergraduate cinematographer internship position has been accepted! Congratulations!

Story:
Spend hours alone with just you, your thoughts and the bare sounds of ducks making love as you document every second of it. All part of the great joys of being an intern on a documentary centred around duck mating.

You get to be up close and personal with a variety of peckish personalities and species. For the purpose of collecting footage of the “dating game” in the world of waterfowl. 

Additionally, The Paddling Preserve has been courteous enough to provide on-site lodging smack bang in the middle of mating season for 9 days. Thanks to this generosity you’ll be able to live and breathe ducks from sunrise to sunset everyday, plenty of time to experience the “romantic” rituals of these feathered friends for yourself.

Main Objective:

  • interact with the resident ducks over 9 days.

  • Form meaningful relationships.

  • Create opportunities to capture the affections of these ducks.

Gameplay:

  • Each new day presents new events and possibilities.

  • Each action has a reaction, your choices can have long term effects so be careful with your decisions.

  • Each romanceable character has 3 alternate endings.

Backstory:

Play as a random student, from the Nuttingham University of Technology(N.U.T),who has just accepted a temp job as a cinematographer getting paid in “exposure”. With minimal instructions, you’re directed to spend 9 days filming ducks at a wildlife preserve called ‘The Paddling Preserve’. Specifically getting footage about the mating season behaviours of different waterfowl.

Accessibility:

  • Available for Mac, Windows, Linux

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain sexual implications and occasional violence, through the dialogue and visuals. We assure you that no ducks were harmed in the making of this game.

DMCA Compliance: We comply with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). If we believe that our copyright has been infringed, we will investigate the matter and take appropriate action. This may include removing the infringing material if necessary. We are committed to protecting our intellectual property and ensuring the integrity of our content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 420 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 420 MB available space

name: Duck Dating Sim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible processor or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 420 MB available space

short_description: Are YOU ready to sit alone in a park staring at ducks? Are YOU ready to do it for 9 days straight? ...Oh boy, do we have the opportunity for you! By joining our quant team of passionate creatives, you've been gifted the experience to capture the magic of mating between waterfowl!
